title: Dado, 1775–1825
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: A purple urn containing bouquet of black foliage, flanked by griffons, printed in grisaille, seated on foliage scroll. Outside these, pilaster with interlacing foliage design or guilloche in a purple panel, and acanthus leaves about capital. Printed on a terra cotta ground. Horizontal rectangle in neoclassic style.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Dado, 1775–1825.
1775–1825. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-45-77.
